mapper.select: select m.perms from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on(r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on(u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join t_role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id ) where m.type = 1 and u.username = #{userName}

select m.* from t_menu m where m.type <> 1 and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from t_role_menu rm left join t_role r on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user_role ur on(ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{mrbird}) start with m.PARENT_ID = 0 connect by m.PARENT_ID = prior m.MENU_ID order siblings by m.order_num
